text.class: aleph-panelTechTitle FID1
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-0

g.text: Reliable and cheap close proximity touch detection developed

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-1

g.text: Functioning commercially available projected touchscreens developed

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-2
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Integration GLOBAL_UID-3

g.text: Projected screens incorporated into smart speakers and smart devices

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Legal-and-Ethical GLOBAL_UID-4

g.text: Legal issues related to touchscreen distraction resolved

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Defence-Implication GLOBAL_UID-5

g.text: Safety factors associated with touchscreen operation of equipment addressed

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Defence-Implication GLOBAL_UID-6
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Production GLOBAL_UID-7
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID1 Societal-Adoption GLOBAL_UID-8

g.text: Touchscreens are made largely obsolete by large improvements in speech-based interfaces

text.class: aleph-panelTechTitle FID3
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Integration GLOBAL_UID-19

g.text: Gesture sensing used with AR and VR technologies

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-20
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Production GLOBAL_UID-21
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-22

g.text: Physical movements widely used for simple machine control

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-23

g.text: Accurate gait analysis used in identity management

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Societal-Adoption GLOBAL_UID-24

g.text: A universal lexicon of gestures is developed

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Defence-Implication GLOBAL_UID-25

g.text: Defence equipment fitted with gesture sensors

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-26
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-27

g.text: Sensors can read multiple users' gestures simultaneously

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID3 Defence-Implication GLOBAL_UID-28

g.text: Gesture and movement sensors begin to analyse intent

text.class: aleph-panelTechTitle FID7
aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-53

g.text: Super resolution techniques massively improve the quality of imaging

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Societal-Adoption GLOBAL_UID-54

g.text: Facial recognition becomes the most widely used way of verifying identity

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Legal-and-Ethical GLOBAL_UID-55

g.text: Legal regulation of facial recognition technologies toughens

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-56

g.text: General machine recognition surpasses human ability

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Technology-Development GLOBAL_UID-57

g.text: Facial expression analysis enables accurate mood analysis

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Defence-Implication GLOBAL_UID-58

g.text: Image recognition used for reliable general threat detection

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Societal-Adoption GLOBAL_UID-59

g.text: Interpretation of diagnostic imaging becomes primarily carried out by machines

text.class: aleph-hide focus focusBar eventLabel FID7 Integration GLOBAL_UID-60

g.text: Image recognition facilitates much richer AR experiences
